title: Hey guys its me Niji The Trooper here
body:
I am the Trooper in charge of the various board and forum states and am here to enforce the laws and see over any of the people under my jurisdiction, as such I would like to be called by my title The Trooper and would like for any of the local counties representatives or servicemen to offer me assistance and do as I request, this is for the better of everyone.

_Kind regards - The Trooper_
